remarks: The norm in a restricted structure.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Oct-2017.)
statement:
ressnm.1 $e |- H = ( G |`s A ) $.
ressnm.2 $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ressnm.3 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
ressnm.4 $e |- N = ( norm ` G ) $.
ressnm $p |- ( ( G e. Mnd /\ .0. e. A /\ A C_ B ) -> ( N |` A ) = ( norm ` H ) ) $.
